Package org.jboss.windup.reporting.freemarker

Class FreeMarkerUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.reporting.freemarker.FreeMarkerUtil
  • public class FreeMarkerUtil
extends Object
    This class contains several useful utility functions that can be used for rendering a freemarker template within Windup.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FreeMarkerUtil()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Map<String,​Object> findFreeMarkerContextVariables​(Variables variables, String... varNames)
      Finds all variables in the context with the given names, and also attaches all WindupFreeMarkerMethods from all addons into the map.
      static Map<String,​Object> findFreeMarkerExtensions​(org.jboss.forge.furnace.Furnace furnace, GraphRewrite event)
      Gets freemarker extensions (eg, custom functions) provided by furnace addons
      static Iterable freemarkerWrapperToIterable​(Object object)  
      static freemarker.template.Configuration getDefaultFreemarkerConfiguration()
      Gets the default configuration for Freemarker within Windup.

      Converts a FreeMarker SimpleSequence to a Set.

                                                                GraphRewrite event)
        Gets freemarker extensions (eg, custom functions) provided by furnace addons

      • findFreeMarkerContextVariables

        public static Map<String,​Object> findFreeMarkerContextVariables​(Variables variables,
                                                                      String... varNames)
        Finds all variables in the context with the given names, and also attaches all WindupFreeMarkerMethods from all addons into the map.

        This allows external addons to extend the capabilities in the freemarker reporting system.

        public static Iterable freemarkerWrapperToIterable​(Object object)
